comment: I'm sure she's a great Stats professor, but this class is horrible and it's very unfortunate some people have to take this, most pointless and annoying class. Not even passed drop add week and I'm regretting, bound to make you miserable and if you struggle with feeling judged, welcome to being depressed for a semester.

Mrs. Deal is one of the best professors I've had so far at KSU. She was so motivational and inspiring. The homework was a bit overwhelming but I pushed through. Easy to reach, kind, offers extra credit, and her practice tests are just like the actual tests!! It's not entirely easy, but it's not unnecessarily difficult. Take her!!!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: One of the best professors I've had within my 3 years at kennesaw. Very kind and understanding if you need extra help. Constantly checking in during lectures asking if anyone needs clarification. Gives study guides that are almost exactly like the tests. Couldn't have been better.
A useless class that she designed. She is disorganized, like when she moved up a project 2 weeks early without warning. Passive aggressive and does not know what she is doing.

Professor Deal was very open to feedback and offered a ton of extra help. Lots of videos that are mandatory to watch for a grade along with homework, too. Good course to take if you struggle with math and need extra help, or else it could feel tedious.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: She wants you to succeed and makes it very clear. She gets straight to the point. Just go to class and you will not have a problem. Thankful to have had her.

I took her for data comm (poitnless class!) and it was worthless. She is unoragnized, passive agressive, and frustrating. She's gonna call you out for no reason and like the power trip. Avoid this entire class - she designed it.
simple straight to the point class
She is very unorganized, kind of reminds me of Loli from orange is the new black. She also calls out students but in a passive aggressive way. Not the worst but very far from being a good professor.

If you need to take STAT 1401, take Mrs. Deal's class 100%. She uses fill-in-the-blank notes, not too much homework. All tests are multiple choice and you get to use a notecard. If you have a 95 you can be exempt from the final exam. She is very kind and an amazing teacher.

Holly is a great professor. I know many people aren't great at math and im definitely one of those people. She gives such great notes, but there is ALEKS assignments every wee. But the thing is you can keep going until you get al of them right. She occasionally gives out extra credit and is very accessible outside of class. Within 5 mins she respon

Great professor! She cares and wants her students to do good. She has preprinted notes to follow along with. Her tests are easy if you study. She puts out a practice test with the exact questions just different numbers and they are multiple choose. Little homework. Is strict on due dates even when sick.

Expect to have only 3-4 tests the entire semester and an FCAR then Final. There's HW every week but it's worth more than the tests. Be prepared to have a printer ready because there's packets that are usually word blanks (thank god), and everything you need to know is on there! (or use an iPad and draw on the packet like I did)

Mrs. Deal was great, provides VERY Helpful study guides for tests, offers fill in the blank notes for lectures, encourages you to ask as many questions as you need, offers to help before and after class, tests are important with few grades but seriously - study guides help, ALEKS is tough but really helps grade. She really cares and tries. Love Her

Professor Deal's course was so straightforward. She gives amazing fill-in-the-blank notes for the entire semester and each period is clear and educational. She gives practice for each exam which is just the test but different numbers, pay attention and stay on top of ALEKS work and you will do great.

Professor Deal is the best professor I have ever had. She cares so much about her students, and sends out emails after every test to remind you that your test grades don't define you and to reach out if you need help. Her lectures are so easy to follow and understand, and her notes, homework, and study guides match the test almost 100%. She's great

the content is very easy in my opinion, and she constantly asks if everyone understands the material before she moves on and will go over things even if one person doesn't get it. attendance isn't mandatory, but she does take it, and will use your attendance if you're wanting a grade bump. textbook and hw website in one (aleks), and printed notes.

she was very clear and honest about the policy in her syllabus and followed it throughout the semester. the work isn't hard and she reviews the notes and homework in class. however she does post lecture slides on d2l, so don't buy the $6 paper copy ones.

Professor Deal was my favorite teacher for my spring semester. She laid out clear instructions and it was up to the students to participate. She will go over anything you have trouble with and unlike some, and she won't dehumanize you for raising your hand. I would definitely take her again in a heartbeat!

Professor Deal was such a great professor! She didn't require you to show up to class but if you did you get extra credit at the end on the semester. Mrs. Deal types notes up over everything we learn in this course and goes over them thoroughly. I honestly could not recommend a professor more than i recommend her. I am not good at math and got an A

She explains all concepts in great detail, sometimes too much detail. Lectures were pretty boring. Takes attendance but its not for a grade, more so if you aren't doing well its because you aren't showing up to class. Homework thru ALEKS and it takes some time but not very hard.

Professor Deal was an incredible stats teacher. She took the time to thoroughly explain concepts and has lots of extra credit opportunities. Did homework through ALEKS and she is super accessible outside of class and on weekends. If you show up to class and do the practice problems you will get an A in her class. She is very willing to offer help.
loveeee love love her.

She is such a great professor, she really cares about her students. She gives a lot of extra credit opportunities so it is very hard not to do well in her class. Also, class is not mandatory but she 
does take that into consideration when students ask for certain opportunities and/or questions.

This professor was very clear with expectations. Grade is made up of tests and aleks hw assignments. She isn't very lenient on extensions and no re-takes. But with the organization and great lectures those really aren't an issue. I really enjoyed her, printing her notes and taking them to class helps.

Mrs. Deal was a great professor. This was the only time I have kept an A in any math class through the the entire semester. She is understanding and extremely helpful. She gives extra credit and you gave a week after the due date of your homework to turn it in with 10% taken off but she already gives you a whole week to complete it before that.

Professor Deal is an amazing instructor; she cares about her students understanding and retaining the subject matter. Homework and quizzes are in d2l; exams were in class; attendance mandatory; answers emails. Highly recommend taking her courses, she goes the extra mile for you, she is fair; but she does stick to the syllabus criteria.

Professor Deal is super sweet and will do everything she can to make sure her students understand the material. Tests are worded almost exactly like the study guides but with different numbers. Homework is worth almost half of the overall grade so do that. Final replaces lowest test. Lots of extra credit. 95 or higher allows you to exempt final.

Mrs. Deal is a super caring professor. Biostats is mainly just statistics but she uses data that focuses on biology stuff. Definitely a lot of material, but I promise its super easy. She walks you through all the code for the in-class work, which directly translates to the homework. Study guides mirror the test very well. All-in-all, very easy A.

Deal is a great woman and a great teacher. She works hard to make sure you understand the content and frequently reminds you that your grades do not define you. However, the stats class that she teaches is very content-heavy and difficult. Only take this class if you have lots of brain cells and time to devote to it. Otherwise, Deal is awesome!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Deal is AMAZING! She truly cares for her students and gives you all the material needed to succeed. Plenty of extra credit opportunities, great test prep, etc. Please take her, shes so sweet!

Mrs. Deal has been one of my favorite teachers at KSU! She provides guided notes, practice exams, & extra practice. There is also some extra credit, homework, tests & quizzes. If you show up to class and participate, you will receive an A. If you are struggling however, she makes it very clear to reach out to her and she will help! She's so sweet!

Professor Deal is an AMAZING professor. Hands down one of the best professors I've had within my whole college experience. I would definitely recommend her if you're thinking about taking a class with her. She always makes sure she gives you the extra help you need!

There are a lot of in class assignments, but the dates are in the syllabus. There is a lot of hw that is very similar to the in class assignments so they are easy 100s. On the tests she allows a note card that you can put anything on. I've never taken a stat class and I'm making an A so I definitely recommend her.

Statistics can be a hard class, but Professor Deal makes it so easy. She has a bubbly personality and truly cares about her students. She gives extra credit which makes it impossible to not do well in her class. Take this professor!

Professor Deal was the first teacher I had here at KSU and left a great impression. In the past, I've had a hard time with other STATS classes, but in professor Deal's class, I'm making an A. She makes it very easy to understand and gives more than enough opportunity to get a passing grade. I 100% recommend others to take her class.

Mrs. Deal is a really nice professor. She wants everyone in her class to be able to pass, so if you ever need help she is there for you. The tests are not long or extremely hard. She posts a study guide with a video on how to do every problem. She is stingy about phones/laptops in the classroom, but just say you're using it for notes.

i had no issues w the class , but i dont really like the teacher . she constantly gave lectures about how she has no time for anything and she is so busy , basically guilt trips . one time i asked her a yes or no question to verify sumn and she ranted for 8 mins in front of the whole class that i was wasting her time .

One of the best professors I have had so far, her work is very easy to understand, you do have to be present in class or else you will miss half a chapter of work, she drops the lowest quiz grade andddd if you got a higher grade on the final exam then a test you did she will also replace that test grade as well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor deal is the most caring professor i have ever taken. She genuinely cares for her students and tries her hardest for you to pass. If you attend class, it is an easy A! Take her!

Holly Deal was a good professor. It was very evident that she cared about her students. She allowed multiple attempts for her quizzes and no lockdown browser. However, the test did have lockdown browser, but you could use your notes. We were even allowed to use our notes on the test. As long as you take good notes, you should do fine in her class.
Nicest professor ever, she is always ready to help, and she responds to email fast. So take her if you can

I have never taken STAT before and was worried to take it in college. Professor Deal made it so easy to learn. Lots of homework, quizzes now and then, 3 exams, and a final. Nothing too hard if you show up to class and put in the effort.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: THIS IS THE BEST PROFESSOR EVERRRR! So many people told me that statistics was hard which I was worried about at first, but Professor Deal made it soo easy. Just participate, do the homework, and practice exams and you are set to make an easy A. Please take her. I don't think it gets any better.

Professor Deal is the kindest professor ever and the class is very easy. There is a weekly quiz and homework is due the day before the test. All tests and quizzes are open notes, including the final. Take her if you get the chance, you won't regret it.

Drops the lowest quiz grade and provides other grade opportunities in extra credit, quizzes, and hw. Hw is on aleks. Tests are lockdown and camera. I'm awful at anything math related but she does a good job at explaining the information. She posts her lectures online and doesn't make class mandatory. Hw is due before test, isnt a huge amount
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Caring

comment: She is a very sweet woman who cares about all of her students. She knows the material well and teaches well too. There isnt a lot of work but its all fairly simple. If you do the work and go to class youll get an A.

She is by far the best professor I have ever had. Math has never been easy for me, but the way she taught it made a lot of sense. She really cares for her students and makes sure there are ways to receive extra credit. You have to take her shes the best!!!

Professor Deal is the nicest lady ever. She cares about you and your well being during school and understands that certain circumstances may occur. Her practice tests are the same concepts as the actual test and you can exempt the final if you have a 95 or higher in the class. Highly recommend!

Mrs. Deal is amazing! Best professor I have ever had. No need for a book, the tests are straight from lecture. She explains everything very well, and truly cares about her students. Final project at the end of the semester. Gives ample time and feedback on project! Allows notecard on test. Never taken stats before, but she made it very easy!

She is an AMAZING teacher. Gives more than enough resources for everyone to pass and even allowed students exemptions from the final if their grades were high enough. I took her class during the pandemic and she made it completely stress-free. Highly recommend!

The nicest professor you will ever have. All of the homework has a guide for how to do it making it almost impossible to not get a 100 and she sometimes goes over them in class. I one time forgot to submit homework and she gave me full credit when I sent her a note. There is a project but she is very helpful and provides lots of example projects.

I read many reviews on Deal earlier in the year and decided to go with her for fall semester. Shes a great professor.. doesnt give much work but she does have lecture videos for you to watch they are not that bad though. Shes willing to help always in class and after! Id definitely take her again .
She's the best!
literally the best professor i have had at KSU. I have never been good at math, but I actually understood her class. Go to her office hours if you can she is super helpful!!

Shes AWESOME! She really wants her students to succeed. Her lectures were very informative and she goes over the practice test during the review sessions! She is so willing to answer any questions you may have. Easy A.

Easily one of the best professors I've ever had. She genuinely cares about her students. I have never been a math person but she explains things very easily. Around four tests that are practically identical to the study guide. Quizzes for every chapter that you can retake as many times as you need. I would recommend her class to anyone.

Literally one of the kindest professors at KSU. She really cares about her students and wants to make sure that everyone does their best. She is a super easy grader since she had clear criteria and plenty of examples. The tests are dumb easy if you taken stat in high school and just look over the material before the test.

Professor Deal is such an amazing professor! She truly cares about her students so she gives tons of opportunities, making it impossible not to get an A in her class. I find stats easy so I would say attendance is not mandatory, but I went to every class, and she would prefer that you did. Quizzes online, one is dropped. 4 tests + a final- all easy

TAKE HER! She is so sweet and does soo much to make sure her students do good in her class. She provides easy extra credit and reviews for exams that help a lot. The homework is all online and not too bad. Also the quizzes are all online and you can take them unlimited amount of times. By far my favorite professor!

Couldn't ask for a better stat professor. Sweet, caring lady with no ego and makes sure you pass, as long as you show her you're willing to work a lil. Has lecture notes available on D2L (tip:PRINT THESE OUT AND BRING TO CLASS). It's clear that every assignment has a purpose in teaching you. 4 tests, ch. quizzes, online HW, and a final. 10/10

Possibly the nicest best teachers that I have ever had. She posts tutorials online to help you with with homework and excel project. Practice tests are close to the real ones. To the one about caring for those who come to class, most prof have a bias towards those who come to class. Take class online if you don't want to come to class ever.

Holly Deal is the best professor Ive ever had. She does everything possible to make sure you do well in her class including lots of extra credit. The tests are very easy especially if you do the review test which she goes over in class. She has you sign in for attendance everyday, but its not mandatory

Mrs. Deal is the best professor out there. She genuinely cares about her students' lives and from day one, she makes it clear that she is there to support her students and will help us however we need to do well in the class. She gives you the grade you deserve; it's an easy A if you pay attention and do your part! Could not recommend her more.
Shes great. You do have to put in work but she makes it really easy.. never was good at math and finished with an A. TAKE HER.

Professor Deal has been, by far, the best professor I've ever had. I don't have an affinity for math at all, and she made the class super doable. The best part is that actually cares for her students, and is very keen to help. She will work with you so that you have the very best experience in her class.

The class is biostat, but should be classified as a normal stat class as the professor shows no real interest in biology. attendance is optional, but she is very passive aggressive to students that dont come. Very unprofessional, and her claims of being so caring in the syllabus were garbage. She only cares for students that go to class. 1/10 exp.

I am obsessed with this Professor, she is amazing and has such a passion for statistics. She's very personable & cares so much for her students. Would take her again for any course. Highly recommend going to class and making an impression on her!

Best caring teacher ever. She will help you and stay after class. There are opportunities for extra credit. Mrs. Deal cares about you and your grade. Ask as many questions as you need. She does go a little bit fast in class however, if you need extra help she does have office hours. You will enjoy the class.

She is extremely easy in my opinion. She is very clear with grading, has easy lectures, and a big project due at the end of the semester that she always helps out with. Very easy going, and REALLY wants you to succeed. You'd have to try to make a bad grade in this class honestly.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: THE BEST PROFESSOR YOU WILL EVER TAKE! She is very caring about her students, and will do anything it takes to make her students succeed. She makes hard topic sound easy even for a person who never took stats before (aka me). Put in the effort and it will be an easy A plus you get to learn so many useful things. This professor is a real diamond!

Honestly the best teacher in KSU. She truly cares for the students, is passionate about what she teaches, and is very straight to the point. There are no surprises in any of her exam. One big project, 4 exams, HW from book. Gives you practice tests for every test and attendance is mandatory! Worth coming to class becasue you will ACTUALLY LEARN!

She is the BEST choice for biostats. The project is honestly not hard if you just follow the instructions and turn in your checkpoints. Provides study guides for tests and she even made us an amazing formula sheet for the final! Super sweet lady who wants to see her students to succeed. We need more professors like her at KSU! Take her!!

Amazing professor! She really wants her students to succeed, it is very hard to be make anything less than a B in this class. If you understand the test study guides, you will do well on test. Provided formula sheet for final exam.

Amazing teacher and would take her again in a heart beat. It's an easy class if you do the work. Attendance is not required, but she adds a point to your final grade if you miss less than 2 days. Weekly quizzes but they are easy. The tests are the same as the study guide. Also if you make a 95 or above in the class you get to skip the final.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: Mrs. Deal wants her students to do well. When she grades its very lenient and she allows you to have a notecard on every test. The quizzes are online and very easy with your notes. She also allows you to exempt the final if you have a 95 or above.

Mrs. Deal is super sweet and is such an amazing teacher! While she was a student teacher, she knows her stuff and treats her students well. She is always available for help and really wants to see her students succeed. As long as you give everything your best shot, you'll be fine. For tests, you can use a note card and she does grade leniently!

Honestly if you go to class everyday, take notes during lecture and do the homework that's due the day before the test, you'll be fine. Coming to class is probably the most important because there are some key things she explains in class you won't understand by soley looking at the notes.

Loved Mrs. Deal, super understanding and was always so available. If you don't pass its simply because you weren't trying, go to class and take notes and pay attention and you'll end up with an A in the class. Didn't give a lot of homework nor do you use the text book. Overall she's a really good professor.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious

comment: Pay attention and you'll do well. Attendance is mandatory if you want an extra point at the end of the yr depends if you want it or not. She used to let you exempt the final if you had a 95 or higher but she's unsure if she'll continue that. She will stop and ask if there's any questions very often & sometimes explains in case anyone's too scared.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: There are 4 test, but if you finish test 3 with a 95% average in the class you can exempt the last one. She is ALWAYS available to help you. If you fail this class, then you simply were not trying at all. Her in class notes are descriptive. She is extremely helpful and wants you to pass.

A graduate student professor, so she's new, but does an amazing job. Bends over backwards to help students. I did not use the textbook much at all, she covers everything in the lectures. Not a difficult class. Basic math and a little common sense is all that's needed. Allowed to exempt final if your grade is 95%

Prof Deal was the best, very easy course, There are weekly quizzes, online homework, 3 exams and a final, if you are able to get a 95% average on all the course material before the time of the final you will be able to exempt it. Prof Deal was very informative, she explains material very clearly and is really easy to understand. Overall great clas
